title: Poor man's T206's Reprint Plank, Matty & Nap
author: Jay Wolt

posts.post_title: Poor man's T206's Reprint Plank, Matty & Nap
posts.post_content:
Found this trio in a box this morning while looking for something else.
$29 dlvd for the trio, and will be shipped in a box since Beckett slabs are so thick. These reprints were made in 1983.

Paypal OK, No Fee ------ Email:  [url]jaycos@qualitycards.com[/url]
